title: Strange Life of a Cat - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Mystery   Slice of Life
tags: Adopted Protagonist   College/University   Familial Love   Language Barrier   Lazy Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Pets   Reincarnation   Scientists   Sign Language   Time Skip   Time Travel
author: Chen Ci Lan Tiao   Lazy Cliché   陈词懒调
description: Zheng Tan somehow returns to the year 2003, turning into a black cat. Picked up from a rubbish heap by the Jiao family, he is given the name “Charcoal”, and so begins the life inside Professor Jiao’s family. Zheng Tan remembers that he was once a person, but currently his body is that of a cat. He has no way of speaking the human language, but can understand it, and even retains the thinking and IQ of a young 20 year old youth. Read along as he adapts to this new world, and somehow tumbles from a group brawl to catching a thief.>
